# Getting Started

## Install and launching R packages

The code chunk below uses p_load function of pacman package to check if tidyverse packages have been installed in the computer. If they are, then they will be launched into R.

```{r}
pacman::p_load(tidyverse)

```

## Importing the data

```{r}
exam_data <- read_csv("data/Exam_data.csv")
```

# Plotting a simple bar chart

```{r}
 # eval: false
#| echo: false
# echo:false = show output without code
ggplot(data=exam_data,
       aes(x = RACE)) +
  geom_bar()
```
